summary: When a teenage girl says she's the victim of a secret network called The Sisterhood of Night, a quiet suburban town becomes the backdrop for a modern-day Salem witch trial.

keywords: accused of witchcraft|strained mother daughter relationship|high school girl|high school|teenage girl
title: The Sisterhood of Night
